data:
## function_createTransition
> **createTransition**(`config?`): [`TransitionWidget`](#transitionwidget)


Create a transition widget.

The widget will include a patch function, stores to track the animation states and a directive to apply the animation to an element.

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../../types#propsconfig)\<[`TransitionProps`](#transitionprops)\>

the props config of the transition

### Returns

[`TransitionWidget`](#transitionwidget)

the transition widget

## constant_noAnimation
> `const` **noAnimation**: [`TransitionFn`](#transitionfn)


A transition to show / hide an element without any animated. It uses the HTML `display` attribute.

### Param

the element to animate

### Param

the direction

## interface_TransitionApi

Interface representing the API for managing transitions of an element.

### Properties

#### hide

> **hide**: (`animated?`) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>


Runs the transition to hide the element. It is equivalent to [toggle](#toggle) with false as the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

***

#### show

> **show**: (`animated?`) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>


Runs the transition to show the element. It is equivalent to [toggle](#toggle) with true as the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

***

#### toggle

> **toggle**: (`visible?`, `animated?`) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>


Runs the transition to show or hide the element depending on the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### visible?

`boolean`

whether the element should be made visible or not. If the parameter is not defined, the opposite of the current [visible](#transitionprops-visible) property is used.

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

## interface_TransitionDirectives

Interface representing transition directives.

### Properties

#### directive

> **directive**: [`Directive`](../../types#directive)


the transition directive

## type alias_TransitionFn
> **TransitionFn** = (`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\> \| `void`


Function that implements a transition.

### Parameters

#### element

[`SSRHTMLElement`](../../types#ssrhtmlelement)

#### direction

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

`boolean`

#### signal

[`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

#### context

`object`

### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\> \| `void`

## interface_TransitionProps

Properties for configuring a transition.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


Whether the transition should be animated.

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`


If the element is initially visible, whether the element should be animated when first displayed.

***

#### initDone

> **initDone**: `boolean` \| `null`


Whether initialization is finished. It determines which setting between [TransitionProps.animated](#animated)
and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#animatedoninit) is used to enable or disable animations.

##### Remarks

If it is `true`, initialization is considered finished, and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#animatedoninit) is no longer used.
Otherwise, initialization is considered unfinished and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#animatedoninit) is used instead of [TransitionProps.animated](#animated).
If it is `null`, it will be set to `true` automatically when the directive is called with a DOM element.
If it is `false`, it will not be updated automatically.

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`


Function to be called when the transition is completed and the element is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`


Function to be called when the transition is completed and the element is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`


Function to be called when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible property

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](#transitionfn)


Transition to be called.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the element should be visible when the transition is completed.

## interface_TransitionState

Transition state.

### Properties

#### element

> **element**: [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement) \| `null`


Reference to the DOM element.

***

#### elementPresent

> **elementPresent**: `boolean`


Whether the element to be animated is present in the DOM.

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`


Equals: ! [visible](#visible) && ! [transitioning](#transitioning)

***

#### shown

> **shown**: `boolean`


Equals: [visible](#visible) && ! [transitioning](#transitioning)

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`


Whether a transition is currently running.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the element is visible or will be visible when the transition is completed.

## type alias_TransitionWidget
> **TransitionWidget** = [`Widget`](../../types#widget)\<[`TransitionProps`](#transitionprops), [`TransitionState`](#transitionstate), [`TransitionApi`](#transitionapi), [`TransitionDirectives`](#transitiondirectives)\>


Represents a widget that handles transitions.

### Template

The properties required for the transition.

### Template

The state management for the transition.

### Template

The API interface for the transition.

### Template

The directives used in the transition.
